Detailed Description

Used to add UserTrackElements.

After the UserRequestPacket-header the format is (X = USER_REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE):
PosSizeComment
X 4 bytes Nbr elements in list.
X+4 4 bytes beginning of first element.

void AddUserTrackRequestPacket::getUserTrackElements (  UserTrackElementsList &  elements  )  const
 

Insert the elements in this packet into the list given as parameter.

Parameters:
elements The list where the elements in this packet will be inserted. The new elements are created here, but must be deleted when the list is deleted!
